channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Piece of hardcore approx 30 x 30 x 30 cm against tree outside 186 Camberwell Grove, 8th September
item.description:
This piece of hardcore has been for a couple of months and is unsightly and a potential trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 188, Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London

item.title: Car debris and broken bollards, 8th September
item.description:
There is alot of car debris after a traffic incident on the early hours of Sunday am. Broken glass, car parts and knocked down bollards. Its unsafe and is a mess.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-3, Wickham Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Abandoned car preventing parking., 8th September
item.description:
This vehicle has been left here since June and no owner has picked it up, the tyres are flat, a dent in its side and registration plate is falling off. Its been parked outside number 16 and cannot park properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Rainham Close, Avery Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress & bed frame, 8th September
item.description:
Mattress and bed frame dumped outside 127 St George's Drive on Sun 7-Sep-25. Items were first dumped against tree opposite (by black bin) then shifted back and dumped outside 127 where they have remained since (as at 8-Sep).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121A, Saint George's Drive, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping Outside Our Shop, 8th September
item.description:
Residents in Crystal Court are not using waste bins and are dumping rubbish outside Unit 6C. You can see the details of one of the residents on the Amazon shipping label.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sheep Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping Upper Hollyhill Road by Old College Court, 8th September
item.description:
2 mattress have been dumped on Upper Holly Hill Road by Upper Hollyhill Road by Old College Court. Please can these be removed asap. It is happening continuously.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Holly Hill Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bushes, 8th September
item.description:
This was reported on Sunday, 31st August of severely overgrown bushes along this path. I was told it would be resolved during the next weekly cleanse, but no action has been taken, and the bushes remain overgrown and obstructive. The overgrowth is now so severe that it is difficult for emergency services to get through, which is a serious safety concern.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 356, Woolwich Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
